Test Case Title: Customer ID field cannot be left blank.
Test Steps:
1- Leave Customer ID field empty.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message 
"Customer ID is required".

Test Case Title: Customer ID can't contain any characters.
Test Steps:
1- Enter Customer ID containing characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Customer ID must be numeric".

Test Case Title: Customer ID can't contain any special characters.
Test Steps:
1- Enter Customer ID containing special characters.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Special characters are not allowed".

Test Case Title: Customer ID cannot start with a space.
Test Steps:
1- Enter Customer ID start with a space.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Customer ID should not start with a space".

Test Steps:
1- Enter Customer ID have any spaces.
2- Move to the next field.
Expected Result:
The system should display An error message
 "Customer ID should not have any spaces".
